TopicTitle: Finally decided to start playing seriously

Articles.Content: I'm not exactly new here; I spent about a year with the demo just because I wanted to keep myself busy. I am a total noob, though, and can't get anything into orbit without MechJeb lol. Any advice?

Hello MAFman, and welcome to the forums!

As far as advice goes, definitely take a look at the Tutorials subforum and the Drawing Board thread. If you have a question you can't find an answer for, start a thread in the Gameplay Questions section.

Finally, take a look at the KSP Wiki. There is a vast amount of valuable knowledge there.

Happy landings!
Here's some advice on reaching orbit for ya.
Welcome to the forums MAFman, enjoy your stay with people here!
